biotools.summary: Tool that enables fast and accurate classification of conopeptides (the main bioactive component of cone snail venom) into superfamilies based on their amino acid sequence. Predictions are made using Hidden Markov Models and generalized profiles.

bioschemas.name: ConoDictor
bioschemas.summary: Tool that enables fast and accurate classification of conopeptides (the main bioactive component of cone snail venom) into superfamilies based on their amino acid sequence. Predictions are made using Hidden Markov Models and generalized profiles.
